name: Don't Roast
description:
Blending cute with disturbing aesthetics, Don't Roast is a 2D boss fighting game revolving around a marshmallow's perspective of a cup scout's campfire. Become Graham, the squishy marshmallow. Equip him with  unique weapons that encourage various playstyles from melee to range tactics. Fight old friends turned bad and ultimately defeat the cup scouts. Avoid getting roasted!

Features:

  • 5 unique boss battles
  • 3 unique weapons
  • An interactive world map
  • A short story immersed through dialogue
  • Simple controls and a tutorial
